summary:
\"Spells and Incantations ... for those with the talent to cast them.\"

adds a couple of spells to the magic world of Skyrim.  Most of them where lost in the past 200 years of the 4th Era. But few of the old spells have been lately recoverd by the Mages.
descriptionHtml:
[font=\"Verdana\"][size=\"40\"]\"Spells and Incantations ... for those with the talent to cast them.\"[/size][/font]

adds a couple of spells to the magic world of Skyrim.  Most of them where lost in the past 200 years of the 4th Era. But few of the old spells have been lately recoverd by the Mages.

[font=\"verdana\"][size=\"15\"]Content[/size][/font]

the mod adds several spells to the magic system of skyrim. The Player can get them as usual from the courtmages or the mages at Winterhold college. Some other Vendors might have one or two Books too. The spells are developed to ease the adventures of the Player. It is supposed to enrich the magic system and variety the spells the player can choose from.

The current Spells available are:

Restoration School:
-----------------------
Holy Bolt  (Apprentice)
Cure Disease (Adept)
Light of Arkay (Adept)
-----------------------

Alteration School:
-----------------------
Ease Burden (Apprentice)
Lighten Load (Adept)
Baleful Polymorph (Adept)
Pack Mule (Expert)
Ray of Disintegrate (Expert)
-----------------------

Conjuration School:
-----------------------
Conjure SaberCat (Apprentice)
Conjure Bear (Adept)
Conjure Troll (Expert)
-----------------------

The File is also available on Steam:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=21530326&tscn=1335511419
The File is also available in Italic on Nexus:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16120
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=\"verdana\"][size=\"15\"]Updates[/size][/font]

Version 1.1:

New Spells:
Baleful Polymorph
Light of Arkay
Ray of Disintegrate

Fixes:
fixed the Holy Bolt message (.... is to powerful)
carryweight spells are now stacking with other carryweight sources 


I will update this Mod in the future with some more Spells as i finish them.

Next to come are:
Rainbow Beam
Ray of Crippling
Creeping Cold

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=\"verdana\"][size=\"15\"]Bugs and suggestions[/size][/font]

Please feel free to report any bug you might encounter or any suggestions you have.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=\"verdana\"][size=\"15\"]FAQ[/size][/font]

Q Where do i get the new Spells? A Any Mage who sells Spelltomes. Best to check at the college of Winterhold.

Q But i dont see any of the new Spells in the Store? A You had to have the sufficient skill in the school for the spell your looking for. Come back later when your skill has increased. 

Q Whats the Powerlevel of the Spells? A All Spells are balanced in damage and magicka cost to the existing spells of Skyrim.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=\"verdana\"][size=\"10\"]Credits[/size][/font] to the Bethesda Team for the ElderScroll series
author: Milkmanic
